job.title: REMOTE Risk Data Engineer Work(with python and Tableau exp.)
job.description:
Description:    

  • Skills equiv. to 1-2 years in comparable position. 
  • Responsible for Financial Risk Management application development using Python, SQL, and Tableau. 
  • Must be able to apply SDLC concepts and have a proven track record of delivering solid, robust applications. 
  • Must have a good understanding of financial reporting and analysis automation. Must have strong interpersonal, analytical, problem solving and organizational skills, and the ability to independently work as a contributing member in a high-paced and focused team.
